content: (madbahaa mumpaake manavaatti manavaallante valathuvashatthaayu nilkkunnu. Thozhmakkaaran manavaallante idatthuvashatthum, thozhmakkaari manavaattiyude valathuvashatthum nilkkanam)
Pattakkaaran : Thante sthuthikallaal aakaashavum bhoomiyum niranyirikkunna balavaanaaya Daivam thampuraan parishuddhan parishuddhan parishuddhan uyarangallil sthuthi.
Janam : Daivamaaya kartthaavinte thirunaamatthil / vannavanum varuvaanirikkunnavanumaayavan vaazhtthappettavanaakunnu / uyarangallil sthuthi.
Janam : Balavaane nee parishuddhanaakunnu. / Maranamillaatthavane nee parishuddhanaakunnu. / Nyangallkkuvendi +kurishikkappettavane / nyangallodu karuna cheyyename.
Pattakkaaran : Nyangallude kartthaave / nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname.
Janam : Nyangallude kartthaave / krpayundaayi nyangallodu karunacheyyename. / Nyangallude kartthaave / nyangallude namaskkaaravum shushrooshayum kaikkondu / nyangallodu karuna cheyyename.
Janam : Srshdaave ninakku sthuthi. / Paapikallaaya ninte adiyaarodu / karuna cheyyunna mashihaa raajaave / ninakku sthuthi. Baarekmor.

Janam : Ninte thirunaamam parishuddhamaakkappedename. / Ninte raajyam varename. / Ninte thiruvishdam svargatthileppole bhoomiyilum aakename. / Nyangallkkaavashyamulllla appam innu nyangallkku tharename. / Nyangallude kadakkaarodu nyangall kshamichathupole / nyangallude kadangallum paapangallum nyangallodu kshamikkaname. / Pareekshayilekku nyangalle praveshippikkaruthe. / Pinneyo dushdanil ninnum nyangalle rakshichukollllaname. / Entukondennaal raajyavum shakthiyum mahathvavum / ennekkum ninakkullllathaakunnu aammeen.
Pattakkaaran : Krpa niranya mariyame ninakku samaadhaanam.

Janam : Nammude kartthaavu ninnodu koode. / Sthreekallil nee vaazhtthappettavallaakunnu. / Ninte udaraphalamaaya / nammude kartthaaveshu mashihaa vaazhtthappettavanaakunnu. / Shuddhamulllla kanyaka martthamariyame / thampuraante amme / paapikallaaya nyangallkkuvendi / ippozhum eppozhum / nyangallude maranasamayatthum / daivamthampuraanodu apekshichukollllaname. Aammeen.
Pattakkaaran : Shubaholaabo.... (pithaavinum puthranum parishuddha roohaaykkum sthuthi.)
Janam : Balaheenarum paapikallumaaya nyangallude mel / anugrahangallum karunayum / randu lokangallilum / ennumennekkum choriyappedumaaraakaname. Aammeen.

Pattakkaaran : Daivamaaya kartthaave! Nyangallude santoshatthinte aarambhavum, aanandatthinte poorttheekaranavum, ninnodukoodeyum, nee mukhaantiravum undaakuvaan thakkavannam akshayamaaya santoshatthinu nyangalle yogyaraakkename. Nyangallude dehikallum aathmaakkallum ninnaal aanandikkumaaraakaname. Ninte karunayaal nyangallude duഃkhangall maayikkappedukayum, ninte dayayaal nyangallude sukrthangall varddhikkukayum, anugrahangall niranyukaviyukayum, nyangallude manhsaakshikall shreshdhamaayittheerukayum cheyyename. Nyangallude manavaallan poornnanum manavaatti shreshdhayumaayi theerename. Ninteyum aadimuthal ninne preethippedutthiyittulllla sarvva vishuddhanmaarudeyum koottatthil akshayamaaya saubhaagyaavasthhayil nyangall aanandikkumaaraakaname. Pithr puthra parishuddhaathmaavaam daivame! Ninte vishuddhanmaarude koottatthilum ninte vathsalanmaarude ganatthilum chernnu ninnukondu nyangall ninakku sthuthiyum sthothravum karettumaaraakename. Hosho...

Dhanyan vinman vaasikalle - santo - shippichon
Bhaktharkkarulluka karunaabdhe - msheehaa - santosham

Rakshakane vaidikar thirunaa - ma - tthil nalkeedum
Mothirabhooshakalle sadayam - vaazhtthuka - thrkkayyaal

Mothiramarulli thirusabhaye - mshihaa - vettappoll
Paripaavana thanurudhirangall - kai-kkondaa+llavallum

Mothiramathinaal kolayeennum thaa-maar rakshithayaay
Athupol paapavimochanamee nya-ngall- nedatte

Maanavar vaanavar vandichu - vaa-zhtthi-ppaadunna
Thrithvarahasyam sampoojyam - thaa-thaathmajaroohaa

Pattakkaaran : Pithr puthra parishuddhaathmaavaam daivame! Aakaashattheyum bhoomiyeyum uyarattheyum aazhattheyum samyojippichathaaya ninte samaadhaanam, ippoll parasparam sameepichirikkunna ee nyangallude sahodarangalle samyojippikkukayum thanmoolam aayushkkaalam muzhuvan parasparam snehikkukayum santoshapoorvvam anyonyam sveekarikkukayum cheyyatthakkavannamulllla aikyamathyam ivaril undaavukayum cheyyename. Hosho...

Nalkuka nanmozhi maanasame! Haale....
Sevikkum nyaanarachaneyennuracheyyum.

Varshichaan krpa ninnadharatthil-haa......
Ennenneykkum ninne Daivam vaazhtthi.

Upamakallaal - shlemoon chonnaanevam,
Chaarumukhee - paaram nee
Shlaaghikkum nin priyanevan
En naathhan - pathinaayiramathilutthamanaam
/tthan poongkaavaanisaraayel
/tshubhran yaakkobin lathayil
/trakthan narddeen thailatthil
/tmrdulan labanon kaarakilil
Paarkkilivan daivasaman
Vishruthanaamivane naam vaa-zhtthee-dunnu.
Pattakkaaran : Naam ellaavarum praarththhichu kartthaavinodu anugrahangallum karunayum yaachikkanam.
Janam : Anugrahikkunnavanaaya kartthaave / nyangallodu karuna cheythu / nyangalle sahaayikkaname.
Ninneyum ninte pithaavineyum parishuddha roohaayeyum sthuthikkukayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Hosho...

Pathivrthayaam - paripaavana sabhaye
Vaanon kaantan - vettoru neram
Sheemon yo - hannaanennivare
Aahvaanam che - ythelpichevam
/tveedin bharanam sheemo - ne
/tsuvishe-sham yohannaa - ne
/tkalpichaan vilaye - reedum
Ra - kthatthaal nyaan vaangiyoree
Sabhaye - ningall - samrakshi - ppin
Tba
En perkkaay--daivamorukki viru-
Nnennaa sathiyaam sabhayaarkku - nnu.
Sparshikki--llen balivediyile
Baliyaamoottan--koottaneya--nyan
/tninna--ntikamaarnnee--du--nnon
/tsnaanam--praapichee--daa--the
/tnammall--kkulllla raha--sya--ngall
Kaa--nmaa--nidayaayeedaruthe-
Nnennodudayon arulliche--ythaan.

Moodupadam,--vadi, mothiramivayaal
Thaamaar vijayam--sampaadi--chu
Pokkanavum--kallum kavinayumaayu
Vennaan golyaa--tthine daavee--dum
/tthaamaar--utthamayaayu moo--nnaal
/tdaavee--dunnathanaa--yu moo--nnaal
/tsamra--kshakanaam thrithva--tthe
Vi--shvaa--sini paavana sabhayaall
Sthuthigeethatthaal--keertthikku--nnu.

Vishvasthe sabhaye bhayamenti
Nnullllil klesham - lesham vendaa
Aparane nee - mohikkaatthathinaal
Ninne nyaanum - kaivediki-lla.
/tloka - tthinnavasaanatthil
/tpaarum - vaanumazhinyaalum
/tvaazhum - neeyaapatthe-nye
Thaa - thaathmaja - vimalaathmaavin
Geham - paartthaal ninre throno - saam

Pattakkaaran : Vrathanishdhayum vedippumulllla aathmaakkalle thanikkaayi vivaahanishchayam cheyyunna saakshaal sathyamanavaallanaayullllove! Thirumumpaake nilkkunna balaheenaraaya nyangallude maaddhyasthham moolam parasparam vivaahanishchayam cheyyappedukayum thangallude manavaallathvatthinte maddhyasthhanaayi ninne amgeekarikkukayum cheythirikkunna ee daasaril ninnu sukrthanadapadikallaakunna madhuraparimallam veeshuvaan nee ivare yogyaraakkename. Aathmaarththhamaaya snehavum yojippum shaantathayum vikaarabharithamallaattha aikyavum ivaril undaakumaaraakaname. Aathmaavilum shareeratthilum parasparam nirmmalatha samrakshikkuvaan ivarkku shakthi nalkename. Ivar ninakkum ninte pithaavinum parishuddha roohaaykkum sthuthiyum sthothravum karettumaaraakename. Hosho...
Pattakkaaran : (mothirangall kaiyiledutth) thante karunayaalum bahulamaaya krpayaalum ee mothirangalle aasheervadikkunna pithaavinum puthranum parishuddha roohaaykkum sthuthi.

Pattakkaaran : (mothirangallude mel kai aavasippichukond) vishuddha sabhaasantaanangallude santoshapoortthikkaayi +pithaavinteyum +puthranteyum jeevanulllla +parishuddha roohaayudeyum naamatthil ee mothirangall aasheervadikkappettirikkunnu.

Pattakkaaran : (manavaallanu mothiram nalkikkond)nammude kartthaavaaya yeshumishihaayude valatthukai karunayode ningkalekku neettappedukayum ninte vivaahanishchayatthinulllla ee mothiratthodukoode avidutthe krpayum anugrahavum ninakku labhikkukayum cheyyumaaraakatte. Krpaniranyathum anugrahapradavumaaya ee valangkai aayushkkaalam muzhuvan ninnodukoode undaayirunnu ninne kaatthukollllukayum cheyyumaaraakatte.

Pattakkaaran : (manavaattikku mothiram nalkikkond)nammude kartthaavaaya yeshumishihaayude anugrahapoornnamaaya valathukai adrshyamaayi ningkalekku neettappedukayum vi. Shleehanmaaril ninnennapole aachaaryanmaarude kaikallil ninnu ninte vivaahanishchayatthinulllla ee mothiram nee praapikkukayum cheyyumaaraakatte. Aathmashareerangallude svasthhathayodum hrdaya santoshatthodum koode pithaavinum puthranum parishuddha roohaaykkum nee sthuthi karettukayum cheyyumaaraakatte. Hosho...

Pattakkaaran : Vishuddha sabhayude santoshatthe thante abhishikthanmoolam poorttheekaricha daivamaaya kartthaavu parasparam vivaaha nishchayam kazhinyirikkunna ee nammude makkalle sathyatthilum neethiyilum sampoornnaraakkukayum, ivar dharichirikkunna ee mothirangallodu koode svargeeyamaaya anugrahangall ivarkku nalkukayum paripaakathayaal ivare alangkarikkukayum vinayatthaal ivare shreshdharaakkukayum cheyyatte. Isahaakkinteyum ribekkaayudeyum vivaahanishchayatthe svarnnaabharanangallaal poortthiyaakkiyathupole ivareyum neethiyaakunna mothirangall kondu poornnaraakkatte. Manavaallane thante rakshayaal aanandippikkukayum manavaattiye shaashvathavum akshayavumaaya manohara bhooshanangallaal alangkarikkukayum cheyyumaaraakatte. Svarnnaabharanangall kondulllla alangkaarangallekkaall mahimayeriya vedippin mudra kondu ivar alangkarikkappedumaaraakatte. Ivarude ee anyonya bandhavum cherchayum thante preethikkum yogyamaayavidhatthilulllla svabhaava vallarchaykkum uthakuvaan daivamaaya kartthaavu samgathiyaakkatte. Sakala kapada snehattheyum ivarilninnu neekkikkallayukayum, anyonyam snehippaanaayi snehaagnikondu ivarude hrdayangalle ujvalippikkukayum cheyyatte. Akshayamaaya saundaryamkondu ivare alangkarikkumaaraakatte. Surabhilangallaaya shooshaanaapushpangallekkaall saurabhyameriya paripaakathayaal ivarude manassaakshiye nayikkuvaan samgathiyaakkatte. Manushyavargatthe vidveshikkunna asooyaalukkallaaya dushdamanushyarude kaikallil ninnu Daivam ivare samrakshichukollllumaaraakatte. Paavanamaaya vivaahatthinte nirmmala maargatthe vashallaakkunna dushdaathmaakkallil ninnu ivare kaatthukollllukayum cheyyatte. Kartthaavu thante sannidhiyil ninnu nalla kaalangallum anugrahasampoornnamaaya samvathsarangallum ivarkku nalkumaaraakatte.

Daivamaaya kartthaave! Ninte mahimayude mumpaake nilkkunna balaheenarum paapikallumaaya nyangallude praarththhanakalle nee kellkkaname. Ivarkku anugrheetha santaanangalleyum saubhaagyakaalangalleyum nalkaname. Salpravartthikallaakunna sampaadyam ivarkku varddhippikkename. Ninnilulllla sathyavishvaasatthil ivare sthhirappedutthikkollllaname. Athil thanne sadaa sthhithi cheyyuvaanum ivarude makkallkkum athine avakaashamaayi nalkuvaanum krpa cheyyaname. Ee virunninaayi orungi vannirikkunnavarkku ninte karunakallum anugrahangallum samrddhiyaayi nalkaname. Ninte vijaya sleebaayaal ee manavaallaneyum manavaattiyeyum kaatthukollllukayum, pithaavum puthranum parishuddha roohaayumaayullllove, nyangallellaavarudemelum ninte karunakall varshikkukayum cheyyaname. Hosho...

Sabhayaam thirusabhayaa - mee - nyaan
Athyunnathanude manavaa - tti

Paavanasabha chonnee - dunnoo
En varanevan nyaan dha - nya
Vandikkunnen va - nne - nne
Vettoru manavaallan thanne

Priyanenne vettoru naallil
Sathvaramunnathi nyaan poondu
Srshdikallathilathisha - yamaandoo
Mahimayaninyoll nyaan dha - nya

Enne maamodeesaayaal
Aathmeeyaayudhamaniyichaan
Viralinmel meyu ra - kthangall
Mothiramaayen perkke - ki
Tba
Durgama maarganga--lliloo-de
Choranmaare koo--saa--the
Yorddaan nadiyingkal--nyaan-che-
Nnavane janamaddhye--the--di.
Tba
Sangkadamodu nilavi--lli koo--tti
Seeyonil nyaan--che--nna--ppoll
Kabarathilavane yoo--da--nmaar
Vachennavarenno--do--thi.

Skeeppaayaal nyaan ve - tto - llaam
Sumukhee svaagathamothu - nnen
Thaathaniketham nyaan pooki
Vitteedaam nyaan roohaaye

Pattakkaaran : Daivatthaal neetheekarikkappetta ee saakshyatthinaayi orungivannirikkunna vishvaasikalle! Ningallude buddhimuttinu muppathum arupathum noorum irattiyaayi avidunnu prathiphalam nalkumaaraakatte. Eppozhum ningallkku nanmakall nalkumaaraakatte. Nammude kartthaavinte sleebaa + raavum pakalum ningallodukoodi sthhithi cheythu dushdanil ninnum avante sainyangallil ninnum ningalle kaatthukollllukayum cheyyumaaraakatte.
